content: this quick and easy crochet cowl features a block of spider stitch texture at the bottom and a simple line to accent the neck you ll love making this simple one skein crochet cowl for yourself or for gifts try the matching hat too materials j/6 0mm crochet hook 1 skein lion brand heartland worsted 4 weight 100% acrylic yarn 5oz/142g 251yds/230m shown in grand canyon colorway yarn needle scissors abbreviations chain- chain fhdc- foundation half_double_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet single_crochet- single_crochet skip- skip sl- slip st- stitch gauge / finished size 7 st and 5 rounds half_double_crochet per 2 cowl measures 34 at bottom edge and 30 at the spider stitch section before blocking
